meanings.definition: Not deviating or swerving from a course
meanings.sent1: Her undeviating focus on her goals helped her achieve success.
meanings.sent2: The undeviating path of the river led straight through the forest.
meanings.sent3: The undeviating squirrel kept running in circles around the tree.
meanings.sent4: His undeviating loyalty to his friends was unwavering.
meanings.sent5: The undeviating beam of light cut through the darkness.

meanings.definition: Constant and steady in purpose or effect
meanings.sent1: The undeviating support of her family gave her strength.
meanings.sent2: The undeviating rhythm of the drums kept the dancers moving.
meanings.sent3: The undeviating clock always struck noon at midnight.
meanings.sent4: His undeviating determination led him to overcome all obstacles.
meanings.sent5: The undeviating march of the ants fascinated the observers.
